author: Roman Silin
description: TrenchBroom game configuration and the editor script for importing. Design your level with TrenchBroom and import it to Defold as the collection.
name: TrenchFold

releases.message:
### Fixed

- Fixed for new masks format in `*.collisionobject` files.

### Updated

- Updated `GameConfig.cfg` to version 9 according to the [TrenchBroom 2024.2](https://github.com/TrenchBroom/TrenchBroom/releases/tag/v2024.2) release.

### Added

- #1 Parse geometry directly from the `.map` file, no need to export `.obj` anymore. Special thanks to @dlannan 🥳🙏👍.
- Textures that were not found will be replaced with a technical texture 🟪 to notice.

### Fixed

- No longer dependent on the `assets/textures` path and it's possible to place textures anywhere in the project.

### BREAKING CHANGE
- Since now there is no strict binding to the `assets/textures` folder, you should update both the TrenchBroom [configuration folder](https://github.com/astrochili/defold-trenchfold/tree/master/trenchfold/assets/trenchbroom/games/Defold) and replace all texture paths inside the `.map` file with paths [relative to the project root](https://github.com/astrochili/defold-trenchfold/blob/c011418364b2a5cae3964a76b105c728f7b36c5f/example/maps/level/level.map#L12C39-L12C56).

### Fixed

- https://github.com/astrochili/defold-trenchfold/commit/8bfe8d5ea9d45afa4f66663a833abe85993ac61d A small bugfix by @ReanimatorXP for `map` file parser.

### Changed

- Starting from Defold 1.7.0 you can convert `.map` file in one pass with the `Convert Map to Collection` action. (_But exporting the .obj   is still required #1_)

### Added

- https://github.com/astrochili/defold-trenchfold/pull/12 Updated Defold GameConfig.cfg to work with latest Trenchbroom version [2024.1](https://github.com/TrenchBroom/TrenchBroom/releases/tag/v2024.1). @marlowesmonkey 🙏.
- https://github.com/astrochili/defold-trenchfold/issues/9 Made all meshes and collision objects positioned relative to their game object. @ReanimatorXP 🙏.

### Fixed

- https://github.com/astrochili/defold-trenchfold/pull/11 Fixed spaces parsing in texture paths. @ReanimatorXP 🙏.

### Fixed

- Fixed folders creation and cleaning problems when using `cli.lua` on Windows.

### Changed

- For clarity, the extension now has a name - **TrenchFold**.

### Added

- Asserts in the `cli.lua` file explaining to the user about the two required arguments.

- #8 Fixed new line characters parsing on Windows (thanks to @ReanimatorXP)
- Removed auto-converting propeties names from `_color` to `color` since the color picker was fixed in TrenchBroom.

- Added the `textureN` property to entities to allow set additional material textures.
- Added script properties overriding with `#component_id.property`.
- Added auto-converting the property name from `_color` to `color`.
- Updated light entities to support [defold-illumination](https://github.com/astrochili/defold-illumination).
- Fixed minor bugs.

Fixed all the **Windows** related bugs (I hope):
- Fixed textures paths in `*.mtl` parsing.
- Replaced shell script with powershell script in the `Prepare Map Components Folders` action.
- Fixed the multiple point entities overriding
